00058 class KVIRC_API KviThemeInfo : public KviHeapObject
00059 {
00060 public:
00061         KviThemeInfo();
00062         ~KviThemeInfo();
00063 protected:
00064         QString m_szName;               //< name of the theme
00065         QString m_szVersion;            //< version of the theme
00066         QString m_szSubdirectory;       //< subdirectory of $LOCALKVIRCDIR/themes where the theme is saved to (not always used)
00067         QString m_szDirName;            //< directory where the theme should be saved to (or is loaded from)
00068         QString m_szAuthor;             //< author of the theme
00069         QString m_szDescription;        //< description of the theme
00070         QString m_szDate;               //< theme creation date
00071         QString m_szApplication;        //< theme creation (KVIrc) version
00072         QString m_szThemeEngineVersion; //< the theme engine version that saved this theme
00073 
00074         QString m_szLastError;          //< reported when some function fails
00075 
00076         QPixmap m_pixScreenshotLarge;   //< the large screenshot pixmap
00077         QPixmap m_pixScreenshotMedium;  //< the medium screenshot pixmap
00078         QPixmap m_pixScreenshotSmall;   //< the small screenshot pixmap
00079 
00080         bool m_bBuiltin; //< bool is a builtin theme
00081 public:
00085         bool load(const QString &szThemeFileName,bool bBuiltin=false);
00089         bool save(const QString &szThemeFileName);
00090         bool isBuiltin(){return m_bBuiltin;}
00091         const QString & lastError(){ return m_szLastError; }
00092         void setLastError(const QString &szLastError){ m_szLastError = szLastError; }
00093         const QString & name(){ return m_szName; }
00094         void setName(const QString &szName){ m_szName = szName; }
00095         const QString & version(){ return m_szVersion; }
00096         void setVersion(const QString &szVersion){ m_szVersion = szVersion; }
00097         const QString & subdirectory(){ return m_szSubdirectory; }
00098         void setSubdirectory(const QString &szSubdirectory){ m_szSubdirectory = szSubdirectory; }
00099         void getCompleteDirPath(QString &szBuffer)
00100         {
00101             if(m_bBuiltin) g_pApp->getGlobalKvircDirectory(szBuffer,KviApplication::Themes,m_szSubdirectory);
00102             else g_pApp->getLocalKvircDirectory(szBuffer,KviApplication::Themes,m_szSubdirectory);
00103             KviQString::ensureLastCharIs(szBuffer,QChar(KVI_PATH_SEPARATOR_CHAR));
00104         }
00105         const QString & dirName(){ return m_szDirName; }
00106         const QString & author(){ return m_szAuthor; }
00107         void setAuthor(const QString &szAuthor){ m_szAuthor = szAuthor; }
00108         const QString & description(){ return m_szDescription; }
00109         void setDescription(const QString &szDescription){ m_szDescription = szDescription; }
00110         const QString & date(){ return m_szDate; }
00111         void setDate(const QString &szDate){ m_szDate = szDate; }
00112         const QString & application(){ return m_szApplication; }
00113         void setApplication(const QString &szApplication){ m_szApplication = szApplication; }
00114         const QString & themeEngineVersion(){ return m_szThemeEngineVersion; }
00115         void setThemeEngineVersion(const QString &szThemeEngineVersion){ m_szThemeEngineVersion = szThemeEngineVersion; }
